tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Kavitha Ma'am is a person whom we blindly trust on. The best thing that makes her so special is her empathy towards her patient. More than a doctor, she is a mother and a human being. We always feel relieved consulting her at our most challenging times.

We get to know about her from a friend's recommendation and after spending a couple of years consulting doctors in eminent hospitals in Bengaluru we have realized that we need special attention and a doctor who has time to let us speak and understand our problems and we are grateful to meet Kavitha Ma'am at that point.

It's been already a couple of years since we are in continuous touch with Kavitha Ma'am for different complications. She is quite calm and an easy to approachable doctor. 

Few scenarios which have kept this bond strong:
1. Due to my wife's criticality Ma'am was never hesitant to share her contact number to reach her during emergencies and she responds
2. Once before an OT, my wife was facing some difficulty with a medicine, informing the sisters on duty didn't help and I need to call Ma'am directly and she get the situation controlled immediately
3. At one point, we were clueless about the next steps and surrendered to her on our circumstances, the conversation ended in her consultation cabin with all three of us (Ma'am, my wife, and me) crying about the situation
4. There was a certain requirement of immediate hospitalization at late night, I never thought Ma'am will come at that time to see my wife. There were some tough calls that have to take at that point, and I could see how helpless she was feeling for us. On the very next day, she was there with my wife almost all the time.

We are really grateful throughout our life for Kavitha Ma'am's contribution.  We wish her all the best.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I am incredibly grateful for the outstanding care I received from Dr. Kavitha G Pujar at Sai Prabha Clinic throughout my pregnancy journey. From confirming the pregnancy to the delivery of our baby, Dr. Pujar's expertise and dedication were evident every step of the way. She patiently listened to all our queries, providing thorough explanations and reassurance, which alleviated any concerns we had. What truly stood out was Dr. Pujar's meticulous attention to detail. She left no stone unturned in ensuring the health and well-being of both myself and the baby. Despite the challenges that can arise during childbirth, Dr. Pujar remained true to her commitment of facilitating a normal delivery, which was incredibly reassuring for us. I highly recommend Dr. Pujar and Sai Prabha Clinic for anyone seeking top-notch gynaecological care. Thank you, Dr. Pujar, for your invaluable support and expertise throughout this journey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
~~~~~~PCOD AND PREGNANCY~~~~~~

First and foremost- According to me personally, Dr. Kavitha Pujar is one such doctor who is passionate about her profession. She's known for her expertise, calmness, patience and so on.
We came across Dr. Kavitha Pujar based on reviews/ testimonies in google and practo while in search for a good Gynec.
We visited her couple of years ago when we were trying to conceive and was diagnosed for PCOD. Frankly, our first visit itself was promising.

Likes:
- Her calm nature spreads a positive vibe. Feels like surrounded
by her aura.
- She listens to us very patiently which makes us even more
comfortable and explains well about concern and treatments.
- No false promises, just 100% facts.
- No pressure being put on patients, irrespective of any situation.
- Her method of treatment is something unseen in this market, but just serves what we need.
- Very impressed by her pace of treatment, medication methods,
and more important is her tailor made treatments.
- She provides what we 'NEED' more than what we 'WANT'.

Dislikes: Unable to find one.

Having said that, moral of the story is, we are PREGNANT now naturally :) :) What more can one ask for.

She had taken equal effort by her treatments as a professional and supported us so far.
Would continue to be under her guidance throughout our pregnancy journey too.

Highly recommended for anyone looking for good Gynec.

- Monisha Nilukshi, Joseph Hecto

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: Labor and Delivery,Pregnancy Check Up,General Medical Consultation,Pregnancy,
review: We had our first baby in November and Dr. Kavita Pujar was our doctor. She guided so well during this journey and we are so thankful to her. Her clarity in explanations and calmly nature was very comfortable. She was very much approachable for all our needs during that period. She carries rich experience and very much accommodative to the patient needs. I strongly recommend Dr. KP if you are looking for one! Iâ€™m sure you will have very positive experience about her work as we are. Thank you very much Doctor for helping us to have our bundle of joy - Pooja Mahesh
reply_text: Thanks a lot for sharing your experience.Feels good to know that you had good experience throughout your pregnancy.Enjoy your Motherhood.

review: Visited Dr.Kavitha Mam for Laproscopy Tubectomy, she is very friendly, she patiently listened to the concerns, she explained the possibilities and procedure, and after the tests she did the procedure successfully, after the procedure also she responds to the messages for further issues, overall i am happy with the procedure and doctor friendliness

The Doctor was very polite friendly and understanding,  she explained the issues in detail made us feel relaxed and answered all the queries. Immense respect to her and her team the reception staff and the Radiology staff who take utmost care while treating a patient. Would really recommend others to visit her for any pregnancy related/other issues. Thank you to Dr.Kavitha and the team for the effort and hardwork in taking care of us.
reply_text: Thank you for sharing your experience

review: Dr. Kavita has been really patient in understanding the problems. She takes the holistic approach to deep dive to the most likely reasons. I have been consulting her for a long period now and have always been happy about the way she takes care of any problem. *** **** *** ********* *** *********** **********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr Kavitha Pujar Mam was blessing for us. She has monitored well and provided perfect instruction with proper explanation in each stage of my complete delivery process.
Thank you mam for your through out support and guidance which made everything smooth.

I have consulted Dr kavitha G Pujar since I was trying to conceive, previously I had PCOD issue once after taking treatment from the doctor I conceived.I would like to recommend this doctor for both pregnant women n women who r trying to conceive. She is very friendly n i was very comfortable with the doctor to clear my doubts. She always suggested me n supported me for normal delivery.

**** ****** * **** *** ** ** **** * her judgement will be 100 present accurate ,very responsible doctor I had called her @12.30am as my labor had started and she picked my call and gave me all instructions and before I reach hospital she had give all instructions to her junior to take care of me and every one hour she use to call and ask for my condition .I would recommend Kavitha Doctor for other as well
reply_text: Thank you Lavanya,, keeps me motivated to serve patients

I have constant issues with pcod. Dr helped me figure out the root causes as well as suggested in other tests too which helped in ruling out all other scenarios possible

review: She is too friendly that I consulted her even before pregnancy. First I consulted in a different hospital. Now delivery happened in different hospital. I made it possible just because of the doctor as my husband left to abroad when I was in 7th month. She made it clear that I will deliver after his return only even when I had complexity in my pregnancy. Thanks to her.

I have been going to Dr. Kavitha since I was trying to conceive and her advice, prescribed medicines, tests and treatments were very helpful and successful.  Also during the pregnancy she would take time to clear all our doubts and concerns and explain concepts in a simple manner so as for us to understand.  My deliver too was smooth and the baby n my health were considered prior to taking any sudden decisions. I am very happy with Dr.  Kavitha Pujar and would surely recommend her to others.
reply_text: Thanks a lot for your kind words,it encourages me to keep up the good work going.
